title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE MAIN
description:
Meeting Klaasje again, on the roof
0) Intro
1) Your name and 
2) why u here? (orbs and drugs from room) 
3) Wildflower
5) did you hear me night before / last time we saw
6) Looking for Ruby

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Look." She greets you, taking a dr..."
dialogueTree.text: "Look." She greets you, taking a drag. "It's dark outside, the dogs are barking and I'm still here, drinking my coffee -- just like I promised." She smiles faintly.

links.title: Suggestion: "She did promise she'd be here at ni..."
links.text: She did promise she'd be here at night if you don't arrest her... Good girl.

links.title: Drama: "Pff... It's surely an act. Ask ques..."
links.text: Pff... It's surely an act. Ask questions. Tough ones, preferably.

links.title: You: ""I found your buoy. It was empty. J..."
links.text: "I found your buoy. It was empty. Just seawater."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "Her eyes widen. "Oh...""
links.text: Her eyes widen. "Oh..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you take the documents?""
links.text: "Did you take the documents?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's trying to throw her off with t..."
links.text: He's trying to throw her off with the bluntness of the question.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, of course not. As I said, it w..."
links.text: "No, of course not. As I said, it would have been too risky for me to use those documents anyway -- my employer gave them to me. In truth, I should have destroyed them."

links.title: You: ""Did you take the documents?""
links.text: "Did you take the documents?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, of course not. As I said, it w..."
links.text: "No, of course not. As I said, it would have been too risky for me to use those documents anyway -- my employer gave them to me. In truth, I should have destroyed them."

links.title: Drama: "She doesn't seem to be lying -- she..."
links.text: She doesn't seem to be lying -- she's genuinely spooked by their disappearance.

links.title: You: ""My working hypothesis is that ther..."
links.text: "My working hypothesis is that there is a cosmic conspiracy of some kind -- and it's out to get us all."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She flashes you a sudden half-smile..."
links.text: She flashes you a sudden half-smile. "Yes, that must be it. Thank you. I feel better already."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Now that I think about it -- you m..."
links.text: "Now that I think about it -- you mentioned sea water. I was worried I'd been too careless with the latch. The documents were probably," she waves her cigarette, "just washed away..."

links.title: You: ""I'm afraid you may be in danger.""
links.text: "I'm afraid you may be in danger."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She thinks for a moment, then shrug..."
links.text: She thinks for a moment, then shrugs. "Yes, I am -- regardless of who took the documents."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It was probably just an accident...."
links.text: "It was probably just an accident. I was worried I'd been too careless with the latch. The documents were probably just," she waves her cigarette, "washed away..."

links.title: You: ""Perhaps the people who are after y..."
links.text: "Perhaps the people who are after you took it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She thinks for a moment, then shrug..."
links.text: She thinks for a moment, then shrugs. "They couldn't know where I put it. I'm absolutely sure I was not followed. And I've told no one but you..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You mentioned sea water? I was wor..."
links.text: "You mentioned sea water? I was worried I'd been too careless with the latch. The documents were probably," she waves her cigarette, "just washed away..."

links.title: You: ""I have this strange feeling that i..."
links.text: "I have this strange feeling that it was an undiscovered *cryptid* that took your documents."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cryptid? Of course. That must be i..."
links.text: "Cryptid? Of course. That must be it." She takes a drag of her cigarette, warm amusement in her eyes. "Thank you, I feel better already."

links.title: You: ""I'll file this under a *theft* of..."
links.text: "I'll file this under a *theft* of some kind."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you, but actually -- now tha..."
links.text: "Thank you, but actually -- now that I think about it -- you mentioned sea water? I was worried I'd been too careless with the latch mechanism... The documents were probably," she waves her cigarette, "just washed away..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The words *washed away* sound dista..."
links.text: The words *washed away* sound distant and strange suddenly. Somewhere far away, a dog barks.

links.title: You: ""I can't seem to find Ruby. Do you..."
links.text: "I can't seem to find Ruby. Do you have any idea where she might be?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I wouldn't know, officer. She had..."
links.text: "I wouldn't know, officer. She had a crash pad somewhere on the coast... but she was very secretive about it, even with me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We found that *crash pad* on the c..."
links.text: "We found that *crash pad* on the coast, miss, and even spoke to the land lady. She seemed... rather devoted to the suspect..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes, Ruby has her gruff charm.""
links.text: "Yes, Ruby has her gruff charm."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...At any rate, the suspect isn't..."
links.text: "...At any rate, the suspect isn't there anymore."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I know about the *crash pad*...."
links.text: "Yes, I know about the *crash pad*. Even spoke to the land lady. But Ruby's not there anymore."

links.title: You: ""I think I found it, but I couldn't..."
links.text: "I think I found it, but I couldn't get the land lady to talk."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby has a gruff charm that inspir..."
links.text: "Ruby has a gruff charm that inspires loyalty... I do wish you luck in your search, officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you, miss." He turns to you...."
links.text: "Thank you, miss." He turns to you. "We should do a thorough search of the fishing village."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Best of luck to you, officers.""
links.text: "Best of luck to you, officers."

links.title: You: ""I guess I should go ask around the..."
links.text: "I guess I should go ask around the fishing village."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Good luck, officer.""
links.text: "Good luck, officer."

links.title: You: ""Ruby is definitely not at her old..."
links.text: "Ruby is definitely not at her old crash pad anymore."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That doesn't surprise me... She's..."
links.text: "That doesn't surprise me... She's careful. But -- before you ask -- I really have no clue where she could've gone."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's in dire straits. Could she h..."
links.text: "She's in dire straits. Could she have hidden in a place to which she has some kind of emotional attachment?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby's certainly passionate, but s..."
links.text: "Ruby's certainly passionate, but sentimental -- no, not really... Except maybe about radios -- all kinds of radio technology. So sorry I can't be of any more help to you..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A cornered animal might seek a hidi..."
links.text: A cornered animal might seek a hiding place that has some sentimental value.

links.title: You: ""Her situation is pretty bad, where..."
links.text: "Her situation is pretty bad, wherever she is. Maybe she'd hide some place that's meaningful to her?"

links.title: You: ""Why do I feel like you've *won* he..."
links.text: "Why do I feel like you've *won* here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I really don't know, sir." She tak..."
links.text: "I really don't know, sir." She takes a sip of her cold coffee. "I certainly don't *feel* like I've won. I feel like shit, sir. All the time."

links.title: Empathy: "She smiles. A bitter little smile...."
links.text: She smiles. A bitter little smile. She means it.

links.title: You: ""But this turned out well for you...."
links.text: "But this turned out well for you. You've *slipped* past all suspicions."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Clearly, I haven't. We're having t..."
links.text: "Clearly, I haven't. We're having this conversation, aren't we? How *well* could it have gone. I mean... " She looks around.

links.title: Shivers: "The rain falls on her shoulders, ti..."
links.text: The rain falls on her shoulders, tinting her blond hair light brown. It smells of industrial pollution and brine.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm stuck in Martinaise, just like..."
links.text: "I'm stuck in Martinaise, just like all of us. I've been up here for... I don't know how long now? I like to call this my *rooftop containment facility*."

links.title: You: ""What are you contained for then?""
links.text: "What are you contained for then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""For my *sins* of course. The long..."
links.text: "For my *sins* of course. The long standing sins of a bad, frivolous person."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""For destroying my first love. For..."
links.text: "For destroying my first love. For working for bad people. The list goes on and on."

links.title: You: ""This all turned out well enough fo..."
links.text: "This all turned out well enough for you -- you somehow managed to not become a *suspect*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Did I?" She arches an eyebrow and..."
links.text: "Did I?" She arches an eyebrow and sighs. "Why do I still feel *suspicion* hanging over me then? What I managed was to get him killed. I understand that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks away, over the..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks away, over the railing.

links.title: Empathy: "He feels uncomfortable with this co..."
links.text: He feels uncomfortable with this conversation. He doesn't know what to add.

links.title: You: ""Something seems... *off* with this..."
links.text: "Something seems... *off* with this theory I've developed. About Ruby."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know what to say.""
links.text: "I don't know what to say."

links.title: You: ""It all seems fortuitous -- for you.""
links.text: "It all seems fortuitous -- for you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""*None* of this is fortuitous for m..."
links.text: "*None* of this is fortuitous for me."

links.title: You: ""The dried flowers on the roof -- c..."
links.text: "The dried flowers on the roof -- could Ruby have left them? These don't fit with anything."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The what?" She narrows her eyes. "..."
links.text: "The what?" She narrows her eyes. "Oh, those ones! I don't know, sir. I said I have no idea what to make of them. Honestly, I think they're just trash."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I mean, there's no reason for me t..."
links.text: "I mean, there's no reason for me to think they're somehow connected to her."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She narrows her eyes. "You mean tha..."
links.text: She narrows her eyes. "You mean that little thing you caught -- when you first came here? On the roof there?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know, sir. I said I have n..."
links.text: "I don't know, sir. I said I have no idea what to make of them. Honestly, I think they're just trash"

links.title: You: ""That's it then, I guess." (Conclud..."
links.text: "That's it then, I guess." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, slowly -- carefully, even..."
links.text: She nods, slowly -- carefully, even.

links.title: Volition: "There is suddenly a strange glint i..."
links.text: There is suddenly a strange glint in her eyes. Not malicious... but dangerous.

links.title: Shivers: "The snow falls on her shoulders, th..."
links.text: The snow falls on her shoulders, then melts in her light blond hair... Cold and soft.

links.title: Shivers: "The wet wind, heavy with brine and..."
links.text: The wet wind, heavy with brine and industrial pollution from the stacks nearby, ruffles her hair.

links.title: You: ""You're right.""
links.text: "You're right."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""How *well* could it have turned ou..."
links.text: "How *well* could it have turned out for me. I mean... " She looks around.

links.title: You: "In god's name, *wake up*!"
links.text: In god's name, *wake up*!

links.title: You: ""Let's get back to those lies you t..."
links.text: "Let's get back to those lies you told."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Lies, I..." She repeats -- then tr..."
links.text: "Lies, I..." She repeats -- then trails off. It's unclear what she intended to say.

links.title: Drama: "Yes! We demand she be punished for..."
links.text: Yes! We demand she be punished for deceiving us. We demand her anxiety. We demand her fear.

links.title: You: ""It has.""
links.text: "It has."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They *also* say it's why the clean..."
links.text: "They *also* say it's why the cleaning lady quit."

links.title: You: "Look up to the grey sky."
links.text: Look up to the grey sky.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "No need to dilly-dally. She's tough..."
links.text: No need to dilly-dally. She's tough.

links.title: You: "I'll go straight to it. I don't wan..."
links.text: I'll go straight to it. I don't wanna sound like a namby-pamby.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Good on you, boy. She can take it."
links.text: Good on you, boy. She can take it.

links.title: You: "Thanks Coach, but I think I'll *dil..."
links.text: Thanks Coach, but I think I'll *dilly dally* this time.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "YOU'LL SOUND LIKE A NAMBY-PAMBY!"
links.text: YOU'LL SOUND LIKE A NAMBY-PAMBY!

links.title: Authority: "Coach Physical Instrument is overdo..."
links.text: Coach Physical Instrument is overdoing it -- even by my standards. Say something else first.

links.title: You: ""What is your name, miss? For the r..."
links.text: "What is your name, miss? For the record."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure." She takes a drag."
links.text: "Sure." She takes a drag.

links.title: You: ""And where are you from?""
links.text: "And where are you from?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Vredefort, Republic of Oranje.""
links.text: "Vredefort, Republic of Oranje."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wasn't the tattoo on the hanged man..."
links.text: Wasn't the tattoo on the hanged man an *Oranjese* Map of the Waterways? The thought begins to form in your head, then dissipates -- something for later.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The victim's ethnicity *could* have..."
links.text: The victim's ethnicity *could* have been Oranjese... -- something for later?

links.title: You: ""What is Oranje?""
links.text: "What is Oranje?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A bad memory, officer.""
links.text: "A bad memory, officer."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Republic of Oranje is a democra..."
links.text: The Republic of Oranje is a democratic nation on the Mundi isola, north of here, over the sea and across the pale. It is one of the six major Occidental nations to hold stake in the continued occupation of Revachol (the Coalition). People consider it a *reasonable* superpower.

links.title: You: "Reasonable?"
links.text: Reasonable?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "They will make you into a fiscal co..."
links.text: They will make you into a fiscal colony, divert your natural resources, hold patents and shares, but they won't threaten to *wipe you out any time* like Revachol did in its prime.

links.title: You: ""A bad memory of what?""
links.text: "A bad memory of what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of lilacs and lightning." She squi..."
links.text: "Of lilacs and lightning." She squints her eyes as if to see them in the distance. "Parks, glass, duraluminium -- Vredefort is a conference city. It's always autumn there. And night. At least it was for me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's so bad about that?""
links.text: "What's so bad about that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Nothing -- if you're no longer the..."
links.text: "Nothing -- if you're no longer there."

links.title: Empathy: "The conference centres are filled w..."
links.text: The conference centres are filled with people who get angry at you if you do something *wrong*.

links.title: You: ""Did you do something wrong?""
links.text: "Did you do something wrong?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sooner or later, everyone does.""
links.text: "Sooner or later, everyone does."

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: You: ""And what's so bad about that?""
links.text: "And what's so bad about that?"

links.title: You: ""Understood, miss.""
links.text: "Understood, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's the past." She takes a sip of..."
links.text: "It's the past." She takes a sip of her coffee. "People can't go back to the past."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Thankfully -- it's implied."
links.text: Thankfully -- it's implied.

links.title: You: ""What do you do, miss? What is your..."
links.text: "What do you do, miss? What is your *specialization*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Something stupid.""
links.text: "Something stupid."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Wanna hear what's stupid? Somewhere..."
links.text: Wanna hear what's stupid? Somewhere in a one room apartment on Boogie Street a young man shows Patrol Officer Tillbrook his genital warts, asking if they're *cancer*.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "His partner Émile Mollins can't be..."
links.text: His partner Émile Mollins can't be there -- he's in another apartment with another man who's showing him a dead dog under the radiator. 'It's dead,' Mollins says. "No," the man replies. "I touched him. He's warm."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""He's warm," Mollins replies, "beca..."
links.text: "He's warm," Mollins replies, "because he's under the radiator."

links.title: You: ""You're a cop?""
links.text: "You're a cop?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No-no. *More* stupid -- Oranjese l..."
links.text: "No-no. *More* stupid -- Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""What's that?""
links.text: "What's that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oranjese lit.""
links.text: "Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""Oranjese lit?""
links.text: "Oranjese lit?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oranjese literature. It's what I s..."
links.text: "Oranjese literature. It's what I studied *at the university*." She raises both eyebrows.

links.title: You: ""What is Oranjese literature about?""
links.text: "What is Oranjese literature about?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Fear of failure, fear of death. Ho..."
links.text: "Fear of failure, fear of death. How it *sucks* to be Oranjese. All national literatures are -- only the name of the nation changes."

links.title: Conceptualization: "What about Revacholian literature?..."
links.text: What about Revacholian literature? People sometimes reveal things about themselves when they discuss such matters...

links.title: You: ""Revacholian literature too?""
links.text: "Revacholian literature too?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No!" She seems glad that you asked..."
links.text: "No!" She seems glad that you asked. "Revacholian lit is about how *magnificent and serious* Revachol is. It's about how you have to save the world."

links.title: You: ""I have no intention of doing that.""
links.text: "I have no intention of doing that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's just a phase the Revacholia..."
links.text: "That's just a phase the Revacholian hero goes through..." She breathes in the menthol-flavoured fumes, savouring it...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "...then breathes out. "Before they..."
links.text: ...then breathes out. "Before they plunge into full-core humanity- and world-saving."

links.title: You: ""I do feel the urge to save the wor..."
links.text: "I do feel the urge to save the world, yes. I guess that's why I'm on this case."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's the natural state of the Re..."
links.text: "That's the natural state of the Revacholian hero..." She breathes in the menthol flavoured fumes, savouring it -- then breathes out.

links.title: Empathy: "She seems quite relaxed for a victi..."
links.text: She seems quite relaxed for a victim of assault. But, of course, what *seems* should not be your priority.

links.title: You: ""The world is unimportant -- I want..."
links.text: "The world is unimportant -- I want to hear about you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Strange, usually the Revacholian h..."
links.text: "Strange, usually the Revacholian hero does not save women..." She breathes in the menthol flavoured fumes, savouring it...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "...then breathes out: "It's a frivo..."
links.text: ...then breathes out: "It's a frivolous pursuit. He saves all of mankind instead."

links.title: Inland Empire: "If that's true then *Revacholian li..."
links.text: If that's true then *Revacholian lit* would fit you like a glove.

links.title: You: ""Back to you.""
links.text: "Back to you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Back to me." She breathes in the m..."
links.text: "Back to me." She breathes in the menthol-flavoured fumes, savouring it in her lungs.

links.title: You: ""Could I see your passport, please?""
links.text: "Could I see your passport, please?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm afraid you can't, officer.""
links.text: "I'm afraid you can't, officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why is that?""
links.text: "Why is that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because it's buried in a sealed pl..."
links.text: "Because it's buried in a sealed plastic bag at an undisclosed location on the coast. Along with cash and airline tickets."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your candour -- why?""
links.text: "Thank you for your candour -- why?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They say so in your tourist brochu..."
links.text: "They say so in your tourist brochure -- keep travel documents away from your person when west of the river."

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I have the legal r..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure I have the legal right to demand your passport, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Officer, I like this place, but I..."
links.text: "Officer, I like this place, but I don't want to be stuck *wandering* the city like a ghost after being robbed of my travel documents."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't want to become an indentur..."
links.text: "I don't want to become an indentured servant in a brothel on Boogie Street -- and I don't want my relatives to pay the ransom."

links.title: Logic: "There are plenty of other reasons f..."
links.text: There are plenty of other reasons for hiding your documents from the law.

links.title: You: ""That's not why you hid it, though.""
links.text: "That's not why you hid it, though."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's *also* why I hid it.""
links.text: "It's *also* why I hid it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why else?" He's suddenly very atte..."
links.text: "Why else?" He's suddenly very attentive.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm an unpopular girl." She takes..."
links.text: "I'm an unpopular girl." She takes a drag. "There are people back home who don't like me -- if they show up, I'm in a *hurry*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The kind of hurry where you can't..."
links.text: "The kind of hurry where you can't afford to *not* find your documents -- but don't worry. This has *nothing* to do with your investigation."

links.title: You: ""Why else?""
links.text: "Why else?"

links.title: You: ""What kind of *people* are these --..."
links.text: "What kind of *people* are these -- the ones that don't like you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I would *love* to change the subje..."
links.text: "I would *love* to change the subject. It's not important. Unless I'm some kind of... suspect?" She arches an eyebrow.

links.title: Logic: "Didn't she say you would have to *i..."
links.text: Didn't she say you would have to *interrogate* her? Before? And that she *didn't do it*? What was up with that?

links.title: You: ""Earlier you said I would have to *..."
links.text: "Earlier you said I would have to *interrogate* you. Suspects are interrogated."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Well-well." She leans back. "It se..."
links.text: "Well-well." She leans back. "It seems I either underestimated you -- or overestimated your hangover, officer."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""If I didn't know better, I'd say y..."
links.text: "If I didn't know better, I'd say you feigned that 'fuck-having' line to get me to say something stupid. Was that so?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a little l..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a little look.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "It's good we discussed your history..."
links.text: It's good we discussed your history with her, he thinks. I can play along.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "We should have discussed your histo..."
links.text: We should have discussed your history before we came here, he thinks. So many unpleasant surprises with this guy...

links.title: You: ""Totally.""
links.text: "Totally."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cool. You told us about the invest..."
links.text: "Cool. You told us about the investigation Friday night. Downstairs. At a table full of local kids and dockworkers. You told pretty much everyone. After you showed them your gun, that is..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Anyway -- I thought it would be *f..."
links.text: "Anyway -- I thought it would be *funny* to say I didn't do it. Because I knew about your investigation..." She cringes. "Does that make me a suspect? I really must stop saying stupid things..."

links.title: You: ""Turns out it did suck -- for *you*.""
links.text: "Turns out it did suck -- for *you*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Not too hard. You told us about th..."
links.text: "Not too hard. You told us about the investigation Friday night. Downstairs. At a table full of local kids and dockworkers. You told pretty much everyone. After you showed them your gun..."

links.title: You: ""No, that was *sincere*.""
links.text: "No, that was *sincere*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm flattered. You told us about t..."
links.text: "I'm flattered. You told us about the investigation Friday night. Downstairs. At a table full of local kids and dockworkers. You told pretty much everyone. After you showed them your gun..."

links.title: You: ""Not yet.""
links.text: "Not yet."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Whooh..." She wipes her brow."
links.text: "Whooh..." She wipes her brow.

links.title: Empathy: "Playfully. She doesn't seem to be o..."
links.text: Playfully. She doesn't seem to be overly distressed. Or distressed at all, really.

links.title: You: ""No. I've just come to talk.""
links.text: "No. I've just come to talk."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Whooh..." She wipes her brow."
links.text: "Whooh..." She wipes her brow.

links.title: You: ""You might be.""
links.text: "You might be."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, I'm not." She waves you off."
links.text: "No, I'm not." She waves you off.

links.title: Empathy: "She doesn't seem to be overly distr..."
links.text: She doesn't seem to be overly distressed. Or distressed at all, really.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My colleague has an *exploratory*..."
links.text: "My colleague has an *exploratory* sense of humour. Don't hold it against him."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He's thinking: "I like this kind of..."
links.text: He's thinking: "I like this kind of prodding, whatever the situation. It may lead somewhere yet..."

links.title: You: ""How do I know you've told us your..."
links.text: "How do I know you've told us your real name?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""If I were to lie to you, I would c..."
links.text: "If I were to lie to you, I would come up with a more *mainstream* name than *Klaasje Amandou*. It's... a weird name."

links.title: Drama: "She seems to be telling the truth,..."
links.text: She seems to be telling the truth, sire.

links.title: You: ""Okay then." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Okay then." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okie-dokie." She pours herself mor..."
links.text: "Okie-dokie." She pours herself more coffee.

links.title: Composure: "If any of this made her nervous, it..."
links.text: If any of this made her nervous, it certainly doesn't show in her expression or her movements.

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you for your understanding."..."
links.text: "Thank you for your understanding." She looks a little surprised.

links.title: You: ""Thank you. That's it -- for the re..."
links.text: "Thank you. That's it -- for the record."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""'The record' -- so official!""
links.text: "'The record' -- so official!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Klaasje Amandou.""
links.text: "Klaasje Amandou."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Same name that Titus gave you. Like..."
links.text: Same name that Titus gave you. Like her accent, it sounds Oranjese.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Her birthmarks also signal Oranje...."
links.text: Her birthmarks also signal Oranje. You don't know why, but Oranjese girls tend to come speckled with them.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Same name that Titus gave you. It s..."
links.text: Same name that Titus gave you. It sounds Oranjese -- as does her accent.

links.title: You: ""I need to talk to you about your r..."
links.text: "I need to talk to you about your room again."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah?""
links.text: "Yeah?"

links.title: You: ""What are you doing here -- in the..."
links.text: "What are you doing here -- in the Whirling-in-Rags?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm wintering.""
links.text: "I'm wintering."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How long have you been staying her..."
links.text: "How long have you been staying here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She calculates. "About four months...."
links.text: She calculates. "About four months. I came in November."

links.title: Logic: "The bills downstairs concur."
links.text: The bills downstairs concur.

links.title: You: ""Why here?""
links.text: "Why here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Here in the Whirling, here in Mart..."
links.text: "Here in the Whirling, here in Martinaise, or here in Revachol?"

links.title: You: ""Here in the Whirling.""
links.text: "Here in the Whirling."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because it's the funkiest building..."
links.text: "Because it's the funkiest building in Martinaise. And because all the other buildings are bombed to hell."

links.title: You: ""Here in Martinaise.""
links.text: "Here in Martinaise."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I heard this is where the washed u..."
links.text: "I heard this is where the washed up disco has-beens go."

links.title: You: ""You came to the right place.""
links.text: "You came to the right place."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks at you and nods."
links.text: She looks at you and nods.

links.title: You: ""You're too young to call yourself..."
links.text: "You're too young to call yourself a disco has-been."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She smirks. "I'm really not.""
links.text: She smirks. "I'm really not."

links.title: You: ""No. This is Sassytown. It's where..."
links.text: "No. This is Sassytown. It's where the future of dance lies."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""If you say so, officer -- if you s..."
links.text: "If you say so, officer -- if you say so."

links.title: You: ""Here in Revachol.""
links.text: "Here in Revachol."

links.title: You: ""Here on the Insulindian isola.""
links.text: "Here on the Insulindian isola."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Came to see the New New World," sh..."
links.text: "Came to see the New New World," she shrugs. "It's a tourist thing."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is by far not the only reason..."
links.text: This is by far not the only reason she's here -- she isn't overtly hiding it, either.

links.title: You: ""What happened to the old New World?""
links.text: "What happened to the old New World?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It turned out to be a tzaraath-inf..."
links.text: "It turned out to be a tzaraath-infested third-world slum."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Called Iilmaraa. And it didn't. Eve..."
links.text: Called Iilmaraa. And it didn't. Even after the Mesque colonized it seven ways from Sunday it's an industrial power house.

links.title: You: ""What happened to the Old World?""
links.text: "What happened to the Old World?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Conference centres. A lot of them.""
links.text: "Conference centres. A lot of them."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Funkytown," she says and takes a s..."
links.text: "Funkytown," she says and takes a sip of her coffee.

links.title: Conceptualization: "What was that? Funkytown?"
links.text: What was that? Funkytown?

links.title: You: ""How long have you been wintering?""
links.text: "How long have you been wintering?"

links.title: You: ""What's funky?""
links.text: "What's funky?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Believe me, you don't wanna get in..."
links.text: "Believe me, you don't wanna get into that shit." She flicks the ash from her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""I do.""
links.text: "I do."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No-no." She leans in to inspect yo..."
links.text: "No-no." She leans in to inspect your sideburns. "You've got it bad as it is."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Funk is an aggressive resurgence of..."
links.text: Funk is an aggressive resurgence of *The New* aesthetic of the Revacholian Thirties, but this time originating in Graad. It's brought there by the Iilmaraan diaspora. Funk is more masculine and guitar-oriented than disco. Even more *dangerous*.

links.title: You: ""You're right.""
links.text: "You're right."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, inspecting your sideburns..."
links.text: She nods, inspecting your sideburns. "You've got it bad as it is."

links.title: You: "(Look around.) "Hate to say it, but..."
links.text: (Look around.) "Hate to say it, but you've got *Sad* all over the place."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeaaah..." She draws out the vowel..."
links.text: "Yeaaah..." She draws out the vowel. "I've contaminated it pretty bad."

links.title: You: ""Is that why you're out here?""
links.text: "Is that why you're out here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. "The Contamination spread..."
links.text: She nods. "The Contamination spreads from room to room. First I escaped upstairs. The Sad got that too. Then I found the handle for the summer door..."

links.title: Half Light: "Oh my..."
links.text: Oh my...

links.title: You: ""What if you contaminate the *this*..."
links.text: "What if you contaminate the *this* too?" (Spread your hands.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The World?" She looks around."
links.text: "The World?" She looks around.

links.title: Shivers: "A squall of seagulls under the low-..."
links.text: A squall of seagulls under the low-hanging sky. Distant machinery from the harbour. It's wide open and cold.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's hard to contaminate such a wi..."
links.text: "It's hard to contaminate such a wide open space -- even for me. At least I hope so. If I do..." She smiles a quivering smile. "Where will any of us go?"

links.title: You: ""What exactly is the nature of this..."
links.text: "What exactly is the nature of this 'Contamination'?"

links.title: You: ""Got it.""
links.text: "Got it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's mostly about the lack of clea..."
links.text: "It's mostly about the lack of cleaning services. And an abundance of *me*."

links.title: You: ""You have quite the collection of p..."
links.text: "You have quite the collection of prescription drugs down there."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Hmh?""
links.text: "Hmh?"

links.title: You: ""*Narcomania* is nothing to be prou..."
links.text: "*Narcomania* is nothing to be proud of, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She almost spits out her coffee: "W..."
links.text: She almost spits out her coffee: "What did you say?"

links.title: You: ""You heard what I said: Narco-mania..."
links.text: "You heard what I said: Narco-mania is a serious issue and nothing to scoff at, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh my god, now it's turning into N..."
links.text: "Oh my god, now it's turning into Narco Mania. It's got to be serious if it's *two words*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She laughs, turning to the lieutena..."
links.text: She laughs, turning to the lieutenant. "There it is again -- man of *words*. I can appreciate that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She laughs: "There it is again -- m..."
links.text: She laughs: "There it is again -- man of *words*. I can appreciate that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "Her face lights up with laughter. "..."
links.text: Her face lights up with laughter. "I'm sorry," she gathers herself.

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No-no! You said *narcomania*. What..."
links.text: "No-no! You said *narcomania*. What kind of word is that?"

links.title: You: ""In my head it designates people wh..."
links.text: "In my head it designates people who abuse substances."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer):""Mhm," she nods, smiling: "I.e. *na..."
links.text: "Mhm," she nods, smiling: "I.e. *narcomaniacs*."

links.title: You: ""It's a word. Let's get on with it.""
links.text: "It's a word. Let's get on with it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure," she smiles. "Onto where?""
links.text: "Sure," she smiles. "Onto where?"

links.title: You: ""We're done with this subject.""
links.text: "We're done with this subject."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure," she smiles."
links.text: "Sure," she smiles.

links.title: You: ""It was quite impressive. How did y..."
links.text: "It was quite impressive. How did you amass such a hoard?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""With money, sir." She takes a drag..."
links.text: "With money, sir." She takes a drag. "It's not exactly the Antistar-sized caboodle I intend for it to be one day, but it's getting there."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Antistar is (or was) a Vesperti..."
links.text: The Antistar is (or was) a Vespertine rock and roll star, who liked to do drugs. He did so many drugs he eventually mutated -- into a corpse.

links.title: You: ""The collection includes NACRA -- a..."
links.text: "The collection includes NACRA -- an opioid antagonist."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Comes in handy when you've done to..."
links.text: "Comes in handy when you've done too many opioids."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is that something that happens to..."
links.text: "Is that something that happens to you often, miss?" His tone isn't aggressive, just inquisitive.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Better safe than sorry." She takes..."
links.text: "Better safe than sorry." She takes a drag and smiles.

links.title: You: ""Does that happen to you often?""
links.text: "Does that happen to you often?"

links.title: You: ""You seem to have, among other thin..."
links.text: "You seem to have, among other things, Preptide."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes. One of my favourites. It c..."
links.text: "Oh yes. One of my favourites. It cures many ailments."

links.title: You: ""Like what?""
links.text: "Like what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Like not being able to stay up for..."
links.text: "Like not being able to stay up for 36 hours." She thinks. "Not being happy. It cures *those* ailments. It's just a mirrored speed molecule, basically."

links.title: You: ""Cool. I took some. For personal us..."
links.text: "Cool. I took some. For personal use." (Show her the *Preptide*.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Huh?" She looks at the drugs in yo..."
links.text: "Huh?" She looks at the drugs in your hand. "Motherfucker took my Preptide! Looks like you owe me one, officer. I'm talking serious corruption here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This does not amount to actual cor..."
links.text: "This does not amount to actual corruption. I can easily log it under a confiscation."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself..."
links.text: "Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself with a smile. "Robbed by common highwaymen."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's hard to tell if she means it i..."
links.text: It's hard to tell if she means it in earnest or as a joke.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She's not angry, but it's true: she..."
links.text: She's not angry, but it's true: she's gonna have to find some more Preptide now.

links.title: You: ""It was confiscation.""
links.text: "It was confiscation."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself..."
links.text: "Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself. "Like a common highwayman. This *will* come up again during what will be an opportune moment for me, Officer Disco."

links.title: You: ""Just looking out for your health,..."
links.text: "Just looking out for your health, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself..."
links.text: "Tsk... tsk..." she says to herself. "Took it like a common highwayman. Don't think this won't come up again during what will be an opportune moment for me, Officer Disco." She smiles.

links.title: You: ""I was undergoing a massive speed h..."
links.text: "I was undergoing a massive speed hangover. I needed to prop myself up."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow... a hardened, callous highway..."
links.text: "Wow... a hardened, callous highwayman. Don't think this won't come up again during what will be an opportune moment for me, Officer Disco." She smiles.

links.title: You: ""That's all as far as that goes, th..."
links.text: "That's all as far as that goes, then."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Very funky." She takes a drag, loo..."
links.text: "Very funky." She takes a drag, looking you straight in the eye.

links.title: You: ""No further questions.""
links.text: "No further questions."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I always heard you RCM guys were c..."
links.text: "I always heard you RCM guys were cool." She gestures toward you with her cigarette. "You are."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you -- I've put a lot of tim..."
links.text: "Thank you -- I've put a lot of time and effort into it," she says without any discernible irony.

links.title: Authority: "Technically, possession of narcotic..."
links.text: Technically, possession of narcotics is legal in Revachol. But you should still reprimand her.

links.title: Suggestion: "No, no, don't listen to *the stiff*..."
links.text: No, no, don't listen to *the stiff*. Be cool.

links.title: You: ""Where does that door lead to?" (Po..."
links.text: "Where does that door lead to?" (Point to the door on the roof.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You kicked it down -- you tell me.""
links.text: "You kicked it down -- you tell me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I have no idea, officer." She look..."
links.text: "I have no idea, officer." She looks at it calmly.

links.title: You: ""That door there..." (Point to it.)..."
links.text: "That door there..." (Point to it.) "Did you know it leads to a downstairs *elevator*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mhm." She takes a drag. "Go ahead.""
links.text: "Mhm." She takes a drag. "Go ahead."

links.title: You: ""There's a peep hole on the other s..."
links.text: "There's a peep hole on the other side, looking into your bedroom."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A peep hole? You mean like a hole..."
links.text: "A peep hole? You mean like a hole in the wall?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Looking into your bedroom, mi..."
links.text: "Yes. Looking into your bedroom, miss." The lieutenant points to her window. The unmade bed is visible through the glass.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay..." There's a pause as she pr..."
links.text: "Okay..." There's a pause as she processes this information.

links.title: Empathy: "A jitter of fear and disgust moves..."
links.text: A jitter of fear and disgust moves through her body, beginning from her shoulders and ending in her hips. The cigarette tastes foul to her now.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Do you think... this is somehow re..."
links.text: "Do you think... this is somehow related to... Ruby passing through there?"

links.title: You: ""It could just be a coincidence.""
links.text: "It could just be a coincidence."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay... do you have any way of kno..."
links.text: "Okay... do you have any way of knowing how *long* it has been there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unfortunately, no, but if I were t..."
links.text: "Unfortunately, no, but if I were to guess -- long enough. The perforation is under the book shelf on your wall. It should not be hard to cover with some tape."

links.title: You: ""If it was recent, who do you think..."
links.text: "If it was recent, who do you think made it -- Ruby?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's very hard to believe -- that..."
links.text: "It's very hard to believe -- that she'd do something like that. But... no. I don't know." She squints. "I just don't know about this, officer."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She *could* have. Maybe she did. O..."
links.text: "She *could* have. Maybe she did. Or maybe it's been there for a long time, the local kids use it or something. Was there anything else back there?"

links.title: You: ""If it *is* recent -- who do you th..."
links.text: "If it *is* recent -- who do you think made it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Shit... I don't know. Maybe it's b..."
links.text: "Shit... I don't know. Maybe it's been there for a long time. Maybe the local kids use it or something. I don't know..."

links.title: Logic: "She does. She must have *some* idea..."
links.text: She does. She must have *some* idea.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'll be fucking covering it up wit..."
links.text: "I'll be fucking covering it up with *a lot* of tape -- that's for sure. Was there anything else back there?"

links.title: You: ""Let's not discuss it any longer.""
links.text: "Let's not discuss it any longer."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, it's okay. Was there anything..."
links.text: "No, it's okay. Was there anything more?"

links.title: You: ""There's no way of telling.""
links.text: "There's no way of telling."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""God... where is it? I think I need..."
links.text: "God... where is it? I think I need to cover it up."

links.title: You: ""The perforation should be under yo..."
links.text: "The perforation should be under your bookcase, in your bedroom."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you." She looks toward the w..."
links.text: "Thank you." She looks toward the window. A cold wind blows in from the sea.

links.title: You: ""If I'd make a guess I'd say it's r..."
links.text: "If I'd make a guess I'd say it's recent."

links.title: You: ""It could be connected.""
links.text: "It could be connected."

links.title: You: ""We don't know at this point.""
links.text: "We don't know at this point."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Do you think this is somehow *conn..."
links.text: "Do you think this is somehow *connected* to me?"

links.title: You: ""Looking into your bedroom, miss.""
links.text: "Looking into your bedroom, miss."

links.title: You: ""You must have *some* idea -- who m..."
links.text: "You must have *some* idea -- who might have been interested in making that hole?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Honestly, I have no clue.""
links.text: "Honestly, I have no clue."

links.title: Logic: "Yet? Maybe it's something she's kee..."
links.text: Yet? Maybe it's something she's keeping for a later move, when she's more sure of herself...

links.title: You: ""There were tracks on the floor. Th..."
links.text: "There were tracks on the floor. They're recent."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Huh. This isn't good.""
links.text: "Huh. This isn't good."

links.title: Composure: "She's straight as a stick, suddenly..."
links.text: She's straight as a stick, suddenly.

links.title: Half Light: "She feels like quarry, encircled......"
links.text: She feels like quarry, encircled... Her eyes dart to the door.

links.title: You: ""It's an old pinball workshop. The..."
links.text: "It's an old pinball workshop. The room back there. This place used to be a pinball arcade."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." She smiles. "I'm glad *some..."
links.text: "Okay." She smiles. "I'm glad *someone's* had fun."

links.title: You: ""That's all for now." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "That's all for now." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mhm..." She flicks the ash from he..."
links.text: "Mhm..." She flicks the ash from her cigarette absent-mindedly.

links.title: Empathy: "She's lost in thought -- eyes narro..."
links.text: She's lost in thought -- eyes narrowed, forehead furrowed...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks at the door. Suddenly, he..."
links.text: She looks at the door. Suddenly, her eyes widen. "Oh... Do you think *Ruby* could have gotten in that way? To the *roof*? She could have come up through there!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's possible.""
links.text: "It's possible."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She keeps looking at the door with..."
links.text: She keeps looking at the door with a worried expression. The wind ruffles her hair.

links.title: You: ""It's possible.""
links.text: "It's possible."

links.title: You: ""Not really.""
links.text: "Not really."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know..." She frowns, uncer..."
links.text: "I don't know..." She frowns, uncertain. "Was there anything else? Back there?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I did not." She takes a drag of he..."
links.text: "I did not." She takes a drag of her cigarette. "Do you think this has something to do with what happened?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I did not." She takes a drag of he..."
links.text: "I did not." She takes a drag of her cigarette and smiles. "Mystery solved then. I kept wondering where it led."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There may be more to this *mystery*..."
links.text: There may be more to this *mystery* -- at some later time. She's holding back. Let's make a mental note for now.

links.title: You: ""That window is new.""
links.text: "That window is new."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It is." She moves slightly to your..."
links.text: "It is." She moves slightly to your left to check her reflection in it.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "An evasive manoeuvre. Ask a follow..."
links.text: An evasive manoeuvre. Ask a follow up!

links.title: You: ""When was it changed? During your s..."
links.text: "When was it changed? During your stay?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah... I'm trying not to lie to y..."
links.text: "Yeah... I'm trying not to lie to you here. Stop making it hard."

links.title: You: ""Then tell the truth.""
links.text: "Then tell the truth."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The truth is I'm a horrible girl...."
links.text: "The truth is I'm a horrible girl. Windows break around me. It's not their fault."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You hear the scribbling of the lieu..."
links.text: You hear the scribbling of the lieutenant's pen.

links.title: Authority: "Feels like success."
links.text: Feels like success.

links.title: You: ""Then lie to me.""
links.text: "Then lie to me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't want to lie to the law. It..."
links.text: "I don't want to lie to the law. It's not my style." She smiles. It's a sad little smile, like she's some miniature bird or tiny field mouse.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "Then she whispers: "I'm just a girl..."
links.text: Then she whispers: "I'm just a girl whom windows break around."

links.title: You: ""Okay then -- I'll cut you some sla..."
links.text: "Okay then -- I'll cut you some slack."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thanks." She smiles. It's a sad li..."
links.text: "Thanks." She smiles. It's a sad little smile, like she's some miniature bird or tiny field mouse.

links.title: Empathy: "Behind it is deep, boundless gratit..."
links.text: Behind it is deep, boundless gratitude.

links.title: You: "Let her be."
links.text: Let her be.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Harry, you're becoming soft."
links.text: Harry, you're becoming soft.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant makes a note in his..."
links.text: The lieutenant makes a note in his notebook.

links.title: Empathy: "He finds the answer unsatisfying."
links.text: He finds the answer unsatisfying.

links.title: You: ""I have other questions for you.""
links.text: "I have other questions for you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""All right." She takes a long, pens..."
links.text: "All right." She takes a long, pensive drag of her Astra Menthol.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." She takes a pensive drag of..."
links.text: "Okay." She takes a pensive drag of her cigarette.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Watching herself reflected in the b..."
links.text: Watching herself reflected in the bedroom window -- tall and sparkling and draped in smoke.

links.title: You: ""Nice room you've got here.""
links.text: "Nice room you've got here."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah, it's pretty *De Luxe*.""
links.text: "Yeah, it's pretty *De Luxe*."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk more about this so-call..."
links.text: "Let's talk more about this so-called assault."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I always wanted to see 'The Only C..."
links.text: "I always wanted to see 'The Only City in the World' in the worst time of the year. It's a tourist thing."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is by far not the only reason..."
links.text: This is by far not the only reason she's here -- and she isn't really hiding it, either.

links.title: You: ""They tell us you were raped.""
links.text: "They tell us you were raped."

links.title: Empathy: "Something in her demeanour has chan..."
links.text: Something in her demeanour has changed. She's tired, consigned to her fate -- to being here with you and what's to come.

links.title: You: "Look her in the eye."
links.text: Look her in the eye.

links.title: You: ""How old are you?""
links.text: "How old are you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm 28." She takes a drag."
links.text: "I'm 28." She takes a drag.

links.title: Suggestion: "No one likes to talk about their di..."
links.text: No one likes to talk about their dirty laundry and their empty bottles. Maybe if you phrase it emotionally...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""For me it's a mix of *me* with a l..."
links.text: "For me it's a mix of *me* with a lack of cleaning services. How about you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Talk around the establishment is y..."
links.text: "Talk around the establishment is you have an industrial Sad-spill in there." She taps the roof with her heel.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Somewhere below, military-grade Sad..."
links.text: Somewhere below, military-grade Sad is dripping off the walls... you should say the first thing. It's honest. It will lead to introspection.

links.title: You: ""Something is bad," point to your h..."
links.text: "Something is bad," point to your head, "in my head. In the past."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's where it always comes from,..."
links.text: "That's where it always comes from, isn't it? From the head -- and from the past."

links.title: You: ""It's a feeling. White and filled w..."
links.text: "It's a feeling. White and filled with doom. Gaseous. Invisible. Deadly. It's everywhere."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sounds like an advanced form of wh..."
links.text: "Sounds like an advanced form of what I've got. With a bit of old love sprinkled on top."

links.title: You: ""Doesn't feel like love at all.""
links.text: "Doesn't feel like love at all."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Are you sure? Love is *terror*..."..."
links.text: "Are you sure? Love is *terror*..." She breathes in a large billow of menthol-infused smoke, savours it, then lets it out slowly.

links.title: You: ""Probably, yeah.""
links.text: "Probably, yeah."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Love is terror." She breathes in a..."
links.text: "Love is terror." She breathes in a large billow of menthol-infused smoke, savours it, then lets it out slowly...

links.title: You: ""It's a feeling. Acidic and crawlin..."
links.text: "It's a feeling. Acidic and crawling with doom. Gaseous. Invisible. Deadly. It's everywhere."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Anyway.""
links.text: (Nod.) "Anyway."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah.""
links.text: "Yeah."

links.title: Empathy: "That *yeah* is the kind that consol..."
links.text: That *yeah* is the kind that consoles and sweeps under the rug at the same time.

links.title: You: ""I hate objects. I am part of the A..."
links.text: "I hate objects. I am part of the Anti-Object Task Force."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's pretty hard core," she nods..."
links.text: "That's pretty hard core," she nods. "I'm part of the Anti-Human Task Force myself."

links.title: You: ""It's a demon who smells of betraya..."
links.text: "It's a demon who smells of betrayal. And apricots."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I love apricot chewing gum!""
links.text: "I love apricot chewing gum!"

links.title: You: ""So do I.""
links.text: "So do I."

links.title: You: ""For me it's alcoholism, miss.""
links.text: "For me it's alcoholism, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cool. I think I'm developing a pin..."
links.text: "Cool. I think I'm developing a pinch of that too. It hasn't done wonders to my taste in interior decoration."

links.title: You: ""I don't know what it is.""
links.text: "I don't know what it is."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mhm, it's a *mystery*." She takes..."
links.text: "Mhm, it's a *mystery*." She takes a drag. "An alcohol-related mystery."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Don't be alarmed, but Mr. Garte im..."
links.text: "Don't be alarmed, but Mr. Garte implied there's an industrial Sad-spill in there." She taps the roof with her heel.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And what brings this track-and-fie..."
links.text: "And what brings this track-and-field god all the way up here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Miss, we are investigating the mur..."
links.text: "Miss, we are investigating the murder of the man down there." He looks down at the yard. "The people who put him there have asked us to talk to you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ah, I see." She takes a pensive dr..."
links.text: "Ah, I see." She takes a pensive drag of her menthol cigarette.

links.title: Suggestion: "Be careful. Ask something else firs..."
links.text: Be careful. Ask something else first. When you go *there*, use words like 'I hear you have been through something difficult.'

links.title: Composure: "What could she be thinking of? It's..."
links.text: What could she be thinking of? It's hard to say -- her shoulders are relaxed, her eyes on the cigarette.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's like she's... disappointed thi..."
links.text: It's like she's... disappointed this wasn't about more entertaining matters.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Miss, we are investigating the mur..."
links.text: "Miss, we are investigating the murder of the man who was hanged." He looks down at the yard. "The people responsible have asked us to talk to you."

links.title: You: ""We have concluded our autopsy and..."
links.text: "We have concluded our autopsy and would like to ask questions about Lely."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, miss. I hope you don't mind."..."
links.text: "Yes, miss. I hope you don't mind." The lieutenant hands you his notes.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I really don't know what to tell y..."
links.text: "I really don't know what to tell you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's see. I wrote down the nickna..."
links.text: "Let's see. I wrote down the nickname 'Lelystad'." The lieutenant has taken out his notebook. He moves his finger across the page…

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "...then tears one out and hands it..."
links.text: ...then tears one out and hands it to you. "We have questions that might help solve some gaps in our field autopsy. I'm sure my colleague has a few of his own while I take notes."

links.title: You: ""Can you tell me more about Lely, t..."
links.text: "Can you tell me more about Lely, the hanged man? My partner needs to hear this."

links.title: You: ""I *hate* apricot chewing gum. It b..."
links.text: "I *hate* apricot chewing gum. It betrayed me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Betrayed by the things we love --..."
links.text: "Betrayed by the things we love -- what a rotten deal..." She breathes in a large billow of menthol-infused smoke, then lets it out slowly...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Brother, blast a ziggy now! Press t..."
links.text: Brother, blast a ziggy now! Press that pleasure button, let the pain recede!

links.title: Half Light: "Sheer terror. Panic and screaming."
links.text: Sheer terror. Panic and screaming.

links.title: You: ""Can you tell me more about the vic..."
links.text: "Can you tell me more about the victim? General information, I mean."

links.title: You: ""I have more questions about the de..."
links.text: "I have more questions about the deceased, but I need my partner here before I ask..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure." She smiles, smoke trailing..."
links.text: "Sure." She smiles, smoke trailing from the cigarette between her fingers. "Do whatever you need to do."

links.title: You: ""I have more questions about the de..."
links.text: "I have more questions about the deceased, but I need my partner here before I ask..."

links.title: You: ""The Hardie boys told us what reall..."
links.text: "The Hardie boys told us what really happened."

links.title: You: ""What is this wild flower?" (Show h..."
links.text: "What is this wild flower?" (Show her the flower.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks at the dried petals in yo..."
links.text: She looks at the dried petals in your palm, then lightly touches one with her fingernail.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Chipped white polish covers the nai..."
links.text: Chipped white polish covers the nail. It's long and sharp, like a mini dagger. The petal crumbles on contact.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Pretty. Looks like a dried *may be..."
links.text: "Pretty. Looks like a dried *may bell* -- is that the one you caught? Sam Bo-style?"

links.title: You: ""What's Sam Bo?""
links.text: "What's Sam Bo?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A martial art, sir." She raises an..."
links.text: "A martial art, sir." She raises an eyebrow. "Is that it?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Samaran boxing, or Sam Bo. Graceful..."
links.text: Samaran boxing, or Sam Bo. Graceful martial arts stuff. 'Sam Bo- style' implies stealth and cool.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Why was it there?""
links.text: "Yes. Why was it there?"

links.title: You: ""Why was it there?""
links.text: "Why was it there?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Why was there a flower on the roof..."
links.text: "Why was there a flower on the roof? I don't know, officer. Because of the wind?"

links.title: Suggestion: "Or an admirer?"
links.text: Or an admirer?

links.title: You: ""Any admirers, miss?""
links.text: "Any admirers, miss?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby? She couldn't have left it. S..."
links.text: "Ruby? She couldn't have left it. She's not old-fashioned like that. I don't know what that flower was doing there, honestly."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Admirers? I'm too old to be a débu..."
links.text: "Admirers? I'm too old to be a débutante." She looks over the railing at the plaza below. "And this place is no fashionable society."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Question avoided. Let's conclude th..."
links.text: Question avoided. Let's conclude that she has admirers. Plenty of them.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She watches you pocket the petals,..."
links.text: She watches you pocket the petals, then closes her eyes as she breathes in the cigarette fumes...

links.title: You: ""Sudden change of topic!""
links.text: "Sudden change of topic!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""All right." She nods and takes a d..."
links.text: "All right." She nods and takes a drag. "I like it sudden."

links.title: You: ""Now that Kim isn't here -- let's t..."
links.text: "Now that Kim isn't here -- let's talk about Sunday night."

links.title: You: ""Oranjese lit -- what do you *do* w..."
links.text: "Oranjese lit -- what do you *do* with it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Nothing. I do nothing with it.""
links.text: "Nothing. I do nothing with it."

links.title: You: ""How do you make money then? Money..."
links.text: "How do you make money then? Money is very important." (Show her some money.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cool." She looks at the black note..."
links.text: "Cool." She looks at the black note in your hand. "I've made more money by just *being* than I have with Oranjese lit."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Cool." She looks at the white cent..."
links.text: "Cool." She looks at the white cents in your hand. "I've made more money by just *being* than I have with Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's not very cool, but what can y..."
links.text: "It's not very cool, but what can you do?"

links.title: You: ""How do you make money then? Money..."
links.text: "How do you make money then? Money is very important -- everyone tells me that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oranjese lit certainly hasn't help..."
links.text: "Oranjese lit certainly hasn't helped. I've made more money by just *being* than I have with Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""Being what?""
links.text: "Being what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Many things. A roller skating inst..."
links.text: "Many things. A roller skating instructor, a secretary, Miss Oranje '37." She smiles.

links.title: Empathy: "It's the world's most tired smile."
links.text: It's the world's most tired smile.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Miss Oranje? Now there is something..."
links.text: Miss Oranje? Now there is something you should *linger* on.

links.title: You: "Wouldn't it be, um... inappropriate..."
links.text: Wouldn't it be, um... inappropriate to linger?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "All things considered -- very. Now..."
links.text: All things considered -- very. Now linger.

links.title: You: ""What is Miss Oranje '37?""
links.text: "What is Miss Oranje '37?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's a beauty pageant. Held in the..."
links.text: "It's a beauty pageant. Held in the year of our century '37 -- in Oranje."

links.title: Logic: "She was 14 at the time."
links.text: She was 14 at the time.

links.title: You: ""What is a beauty pageant?""
links.text: "What is a beauty pageant?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's a competition." She takes a d..."
links.text: "It's a competition." She takes a drag. "For stupid girls. Men look at them and choose the most beautiful."

links.title: You: ""What is beauty?""
links.text: "What is beauty?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""When you have the fewest deviation..."
links.text: "When you have the fewest deviations from the norm. I've been told it's a type of mediocrity that I possess."

links.title: You: ""So you were the most beautiful?""
links.text: "So you were the most beautiful?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes. And for that I got a crown an..."
links.text: "Yes. And for that I got a crown and a sash -- and a sceptre. And a scholarship to study Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""So you were stupid and mediocre?""
links.text: "So you were stupid and mediocre?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No." She cranes her neck. "I was t..."
links.text: "No." She cranes her neck. "I was the *most* stupid and mediocre. And I got a crown and a sash -- and a sceptre -- for it. And a scholarship to study Oranjese lit."

links.title: You: ""You were 14?""
links.text: "You were 14?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Indeed.""
links.text: "Indeed."

links.title: Empathy: "Her voice is indifferent to the num..."
links.text: Her voice is indifferent to the number.

links.title: You: ""Cool." (Raise your thumb.)"
links.text: "Cool." (Raise your thumb.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Supercool." She raises her coffee..."
links.text: "Supercool." She raises her coffee cup as though making a toast. "Full disclosure -- I was Miss *Teen* Oranje '37. The pageant was discontinued recently."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Another innocent tradition bulldoze..."
links.text: Another innocent tradition bulldozed by the march of ethical *progress*!

links.title: You: "(Lower your thumb.) "I disapprove o..."
links.text: (Lower your thumb.) "I disapprove of this custom."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It was okay." She shrugs. "And it..."
links.text: "It was okay." She shrugs. "And it was called Miss *Teen* Oranje '37, actually. You'll be glad to hear the pageant was discontinued."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The march of ethical progress conti..."
links.text: The march of ethical progress continues.

links.title: You: ""I don't think I've ever been 14.""
links.text: "I don't think I've ever been 14."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think I've ever heard anyt..."
links.text: "I don't think I've ever heard anything less relevant to any investigation."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""C'mon, detective, cut him some sla..."
links.text: "C'mon, detective, cut him some slack. These may be the final hours of human existence."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""C'mon, detective, cut him some sla..."
links.text: "C'mon, detective, cut him some slack. This guy's been through some heavy-duty emotional stuff."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""C'mon, detective, he's the most re..."
links.text: "C'mon, detective, he's the most repentant law official in the land. I don't mind."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's okay, he's just getting his b..."
links.text: "It's okay, he's just getting his bearings. The world of beauty pageants *is* bewildering."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's okay, I don't mind. The world..."
links.text: "It's okay, I don't mind. The world of beauty pageants is absurd and bewildering."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's okay. This is what superstar..."
links.text: "It's okay. This is what superstar law officials do. I'm getting used to it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's okay. This is just him being..."
links.text: "It's okay. This is just him being a scintillating wordsmith. I'm used to it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Neither do I," she says calmly. "I..."
links.text: "Neither do I," she says calmly. "I think it's *alcohol* that makes you feel like that. It must have something to do with partying."

links.title: You: ""Understood." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Understood." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mhm." She gestures toward the tabl..."
links.text: "Mhm." She gestures toward the table. "I would offer you coffee, but it's garbage -- literally tastes like poison." She takes a sip.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Of course she won a beauty pageant...."
links.text: Of course she won a beauty pageant. She's very symmetrical.

links.title: You: ""I noticed your room is close to mi..."
links.text: "I noticed your room is close to mine. I have a personal question."

links.title: You: ""Let's return to this later, miss."..."
links.text: "Let's return to this later, miss." [Leave.]

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Why not? I'll be here until 23.00,..."
links.text: "Why not? I'll be here until 23.00, drinking coffee most likely..."

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Hello again, officer." She sounds..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, officer." She sounds tired now. All the pep is gone.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's always good to see you." She..."
dialogueTree.text: "It's always good to see you." She cracks a weary smile, leaning back against the railing.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Officer. What brings you up here i..."
dialogueTree.text: "Officer. What brings you up here in the rain?" She leans back against the railing.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I was just thinking -- what a nice..."
dialogueTree.text: "I was just thinking -- what a nice day for questions." She lights a cigarette. "Pertaining to a murder investigation."

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I was just thinking what a nice ev..."
dialogueTree.text: "I was just thinking what a nice evening it is." She looks around. "For taking part in a murder investigation."

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Officer." She nods to you in greet..."
dialogueTree.text: "Officer." She nods to you in greeting. "It's a fine day for questions."

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Hello, officer." Legs crossed, she..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello, officer." Legs crossed, she leans back against the railing. "What brings you up here again?"

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Welcome to the roof." The young wo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to the roof." The young woman has a cigarette in one hand and a cup of coffee in the other.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Her hair is still slick from the sh..."
links.text: Her hair is still slick from the shower.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Below her silvery jumpsuit -- an at..."
links.text: Below her silvery jumpsuit -- an athletic young body. Built long and lean...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "...then toned over several years of..."
links.text: ...then toned over several years of self-defence training. You can sense it in the sharp pointing of her elbows.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry for the mess down there...."
links.text: "I'm sorry for the mess down there. The cleaning lady hasn't come by in *days*. I'm beginning to wonder if she ever will..."

links.title: You: ""Nice view you've got here.""
links.text: "Nice view you've got here."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's much nicer now." Her eyes wan..."
links.text: "It's much nicer now." Her eyes wander north, toward the yard...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Where the dead body used to hang, c..."
links.text: Where the dead body used to hang, clearly visible from the roof. But no longer.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you for that, officers. Trul..."
links.text: "Thank you for that, officers. Truly."

links.title: Empathy: "There is something in her eyes -- t..."
links.text: There is something in her eyes -- the same sadness? Yes, from back in the hallway when she first told you about the hanging, in the hallway.

links.title: Empathy: "There is something in her light bro..."
links.text: There is something in her light brown eyes... a sadness. When she thinks about the death of that man.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Nice? I don't know about that, off..."
links.text: "Nice? I don't know about that, officer..." She looks north, toward the yard.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Where the ripe corpse of a man stil..."
links.text: Where the ripe corpse of a man still lies on the ground, spotted with green and purple.
