links.title: Composure: "She tries to look indifferent, but..."
links.text: She tries to look indifferent, but still has to take a drag of her cigarette -- so as not to flinch.

links.title: Empathy: "That must be her tell: the cigarett..."
links.text: That must be her tell: the cigarette. It hurts her to look directly at the corpse so she reverts her gaze to you.

links.title: Empathy: "The woman doesn't flinch, but there..."
links.text: The woman doesn't flinch, but there is something in her eyes -- the same sadness? Yes, from when she first told you about the hanging, in the hallway.

links.title: Empathy: "The woman doesn't flinch, but there..."
links.text: The woman doesn't flinch, but there is something in her light brown eyes... a sadness.

links.title: The Hanged Man: "Where a ripe corpse still hangs fro..."
links.text: Where a ripe corpse still hangs from the tree, spotted with green and purple.

links.title: You: ""Is there a cleaning lady? I think..."
links.text: "Is there a cleaning lady? I think I *need* one." (Proceed politely.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes! Legends of Room #1 have ma..."
links.text: "Oh yes! Legends of Room #1 have made their way around the building. They say a portal to Hell has opened in there."

links.title: You: ""Disco Infernum.""
links.text: "Disco Infernum."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods approvingly. "They also sa..."
links.text: She nods approvingly. "They also say that's why the cleaning lady quit. Because of the *Infernum*."

links.title: You: ""Hell? You know not of which you sp..."
links.text: "Hell? You know not of which you speak!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh, I *do* -- they also say it's w..."
links.text: "Oh, I *do* -- they also say it's why the cleaning lady quit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She just admitted to being on famil..."
links.text: She just admitted to being on familiar terms with Hell -- a rough life, certainly.

links.title: You: ""There are vortices of dark energy..."
links.text: "There are vortices of dark energy present, but not to Hell -- to another place. A *third* place, much different from our world."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A third place? Interesting." She t..."
links.text: "A third place? Interesting." She takes a sip of coffee. "That's probably why the cleaning lady quit."

links.title: You: ""No, I just trashed the place.""
links.text: "No, I just trashed the place."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know." She smiles with her eyebr..."
links.text: "I know." She smiles with her eyebrows. "That's *probably* also why the cleaning lady quit."

links.title: You: ""No time for pleasantries. We have..."
links.text: "No time for pleasantries. We have questions for you." (Proceed in a rush.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Right." She turns to face the wind..."
links.text: "Right." She turns to face the wind, letting it dry her hair.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm Kim Kitsuragi." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "I'm Kim Kitsuragi." The lieutenant steps in. "I'm a detective from Precinct 57. I believe you have already met my colleague from Precinct 41."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm Kim Kitsuragi." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "I'm Kim Kitsuragi." The lieutenant steps in. "I'm a detective from Precinct 57. I see you've already met my colleague."

links.title: Empathy: "This does not come as good news to..."
links.text: This does not come as good news to him.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever... This is the fabled..."
links.text: "Have I ever... This is the fabled Cop of the Apocalypse."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What happened, man? The end was su..."
links.text: "What happened, man? The end was supposed to be mere seconds away. Why are we still here?"

links.title: You: ""I'm disappointed it's dragging out..."
links.text: "I'm disappointed it's dragging out like this. What a farce..." (Look around.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know," she says with great melan..."
links.text: "I know," she says with great melancholy. "What now?"

links.title: Half Light: "Now she's trapped here, in the cage..."
links.text: Now she's trapped here, in the cage -- just like you.

links.title: You: "(With contempt written all over you..."
links.text: (With contempt written all over your face.) "Fucking *end* already."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah, man." Her face wrinkles into..."
links.text: "Yeah, man." Her face wrinkles into a rock 'n' roll smile.

links.title: Conceptualization: "What is there to do now -- stranded..."
links.text: What is there to do now -- stranded here? The question is personal to her. More than humour.

links.title: You: ""New information has come to light..."
links.text: "New information has come to light -- it is a matter of *weeks* now. A great reckoning of the classes. Revachol explodes in vigilante violence. It's foretold."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow..." Vapour rises from her coff..."
links.text: "Wow..." Vapour rises from her coffee cup. "Can it be stopped? And if not, what are we to do with the time left?"

links.title: You: ""Know that I am no longer the Cop o..."
links.text: "Know that I am no longer the Cop of the Apocalypse. The prophecy was wrong. The signs meant nothing. The hangover has passed."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh." She pauses. "Well, you know....."
links.text: "Oh." She pauses. "Well, you know... I'm sad to hear that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""His arrival is a sign of the end t..."
links.text: "His arrival is a sign of the end times. All this," she looks around, "will come crashing down in mere days."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Although -- if I remember correctl..."
links.text: "Although -- if I remember correctly -- there are still some centuries to go. Very anticlimactic."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Now, I'm no expert on cops, but th..."
links.text: "Now, I'm no expert on cops, but that sounds like one special police officer to me."

links.title: You: ""Yes, my copotype is unbelievably r..."
links.text: "Yes, my copotype is unbelievably rare."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow, there are *copotypes*..." Vap..."
links.text: "Wow, there are *copotypes*..." Vapour rises from the coffee cup in her hand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you -- there really,..."
links.text: "I can assure you -- there really, really are *not*."

links.title: You: ""Know that I am no longer the Cop o..."
links.text: "Know that I am no longer the Cop of the Apocalypse. The prophecy was wrong. The signs meant nothing. The hangover has passed."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever.... This is the one an..."
links.text: "Have I ever.... This is the one and only Superstar Cop. He's kind of a big deal around here."

links.title: You: ""Hear that, Kim? I am a *huge* deal..."
links.text: "Hear that, Kim? I am a *huge* deal around here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Miss, I don't know what he's told..."
links.text: "Miss, I don't know what he's told you, but there are no superstars among police officers."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course there are. Look at him....."
links.text: "Of course there are. Look at him..." She looks at you, then turns back to the lieutenant. "He is The Phoenix. What brings The Phoenix back to me?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, I swear I have no idea what s..."
links.text: "Kim, I swear I have no idea what she's talking about."

links.title: You: ""This is part of the... khm... *thi..."
links.text: "This is part of the... khm... *thing* I told you about."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, I understood that, officer."..."
links.text: "Yes, I understood that, officer." He turns to the young woman.

links.title: You: ""I am sad to say I have shifted *co..."
links.text: "I am sad to say I have shifted *copotype* since we last saw each other. I am a different cop now."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow..." Vapour rises from the coff..."
links.text: "Wow..." Vapour rises from the coffee cup in her hand.

links.title: You: ""Yes. *Wow*." (Lean in.) "I am now..."
links.text: "Yes. *Wow*." (Lean in.) "I am now a herald of the Planetary Slaughterhouse. The Abattoir To Come."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow indeed... And what brings this..."
links.text: "Wow indeed... And what brings this herald back to me?"

links.title: You: ""No. Not wow." (Lean in.) "I am the..."
links.text: "No. Not wow." (Lean in.) "I am the most boring cop in the world now. Nothing like *that* will ever happen again."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I very much doubt that. What bring..."
links.text: "I very much doubt that. What brings this *so-called* boring cop back to me?"

links.title: You: ""Things are very far from *wow*, li..."
links.text: "Things are very far from *wow*, little miss." (Lean in.) "I am a changed man, a cop reborn to *repent* my shortcomings -- I am the Sorry Cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A penitent cop-monk..." she says t..."
links.text: "A penitent cop-monk..." she says to herself. "What brings this *changed man* to me?"

links.title: You: ""Martinaise is very lucky. Only one..."
links.text: "Martinaise is very lucky. Only one in a *thousand* cops wakes up as the Superstar Cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow." She turns to the lieutenant...."
links.text: "Wow." She turns to the lieutenant. "What brings *The Phoenix* back to me?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Phoenix is one of the many nick..."
links.text: The Phoenix is one of the many nicknames of Guillaume le Million, Revachol's second greatest (male) disco artist. This is an honour.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever... This is the world's..."
links.text: "Have I ever... This is the world's most lamentable cop."

links.title: Authority: "Do *not* go along with this."
links.text: Do *not* go along with this.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I'm the Sorry Cop.""
links.text: "I'm sorry. I'm the Sorry Cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's okay, it's absolutely okay to..."
links.text: "It's okay, it's absolutely okay to be that." She nods compassionately. "What is this about, officers?"

links.title: You: ""No. That's not me anymore. I am a..."
links.text: "No. That's not me anymore. I am a Superstar Cop now."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I stand corrected. What brings you..."
links.text: "I stand corrected. What brings you back to me -- superstardom?"

links.title: You: ""No. That's not me anymore. I am th..."
links.text: "No. That's not me anymore. I am the Cop of the Apocalypse now."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I stand corrected. What brings you..."
links.text: "I stand corrected. What brings you back to me -- the coming apocalypse?"

links.title: You: ""That's not me anymore. I am just a..."
links.text: "That's not me anymore. I am just a regular cop now. Regular law official."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""An unnecessary development, if you..."
links.text: "An unnecessary development, if you ask me." She shakes her head. "What brings this supposedly *regular* law official back to me?"

links.title: You: ""Those days are behind me. I am her..."
links.text: "Those days are behind me. I am here to ask questions."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Questions? What about?""
links.text: "Questions? What about?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever... This man has an *un..."
links.text: "Have I ever... This man has an *unforgettable* way with words."

links.title: You: ""You must have me confused with som..."
links.text: "You must have me confused with someone else. I'm just a regular, down-to-earth law official."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I doubt it." She shakes her head...."
links.text: "I doubt it." She shakes her head. "You can't bury that kind of fire. What brought you back to me, Fire Man?"

links.title: You: ""I would never do anything interest..."
links.text: "I would never do anything interesting like that. I'm trying to become the world's most regular cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I doubt you will succeed." She sha..."
links.text: "I doubt you will succeed." She shakes her head. "So, what is this about, officers?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's almost imperceptible in the co..."
links.text: It's almost imperceptible in the cold wind, but the blood vessels on her cheeks and neck dilate.

links.title: You: ""I stand by my words.""
links.text: "I stand by my words."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She tilts her head to the side and..."
links.text: She tilts her head to the side and smiles. Vapour rises from her coffee cup.

links.title: You: ""I would like to withdraw the comme..."
links.text: "I would like to withdraw the comment I made earlier. Given the situation we find ourselves in now, it seems out of place."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And what is that situation?" She l..."
links.text: "And what is that situation?" She looks at the lieutenant.

links.title: You: ""Say nothing.""
links.text: "Say nothing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""See?" She turns to the lieutenant...."
links.text: "See?" She turns to the lieutenant. "'Say nothing'. So strange. Who says that? What is going on here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever! This is the biggest f..."
links.text: "Have I ever! This is the biggest fan of Ostentatious Orchestrations I have seen in my *life*. And I have seen a few..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""'Oh yeah,'" she declares. "'Life g..."
links.text: "'Oh yeah,'" she declares. "'Life gets hard -- but we go on.'"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The chorus of the '35 single "Megaf..."
links.text: The chorus of the '35 single "Megafoning The Entire Human Race," instills you with the fuck-it-all swagger that prompts one to plough into grannies on your morning stroll.

links.title: You: ""It's gotten pretty hard in the mea..."
links.text: "It's gotten pretty hard in the meantime -- but I go on."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I can see that." She nods. "I'm gl..."
links.text: "I can see that." She nods. "I'm glad all this *onward going* has brought you to me."

links.title: You: ""How long, do you think, until the..."
links.text: "How long, do you think, until the hard wears us down?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh, I've got a couple of good year..."
links.text: "Oh, I've got a couple of good years left on my warranty..." She looks down at her body shimmering in the silver jumpsuit.

links.title: Endurance: "No. She reached the end of her elas..."
links.text: No. She reached the end of her elasticity about two months ago -- from here on out, every chip and knick and blow stays in there somewhere.

links.title: You: ""Things are only getting easier for..."
links.text: "Things are only getting easier for me. I'm a police man: Too-doo-roo-doo!" (Imitate a siren.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is not actually what a police..."
links.text: "That is not actually what a police siren sounds like." The lieutenant turns to the young woman.

links.title: You: ""I've found something more *downbea..."
links.text: "I've found something more *downbeat* for my next appearance." (Whip out the tape of "Smallest Church")

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's the one! The Small Sad Chur..."
links.text: "That's the one! The Small Sad Church Song! I've missed it, I really have."

links.title: You: ""You have? Why?""
links.text: "You have? Why?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The Small Sad Church Song tells it..."
links.text: "The Small Sad Church Song tells it like it is, detective -- *sad*."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's no mere turn of phrase. This y..."
links.text: It's no mere turn of phrase. This young woman has a deeply rooted understanding of what *sad* means.

links.title: You: ""You ain't seen nothing yet. There'..."
links.text: "You ain't seen nothing yet. There's a *karaoke* stage downstairs."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow..." She shakes her head in sil..."
links.text: "Wow..." She shakes her head in silent disbelief, breathing in the coffee smell.

links.title: You: ""Johnny Law is about to tear it up...."
links.text: "Johnny Law is about to tear it up. Sad-style."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assure you, he is not about to t..."
links.text: "I assure you, he is not about to tear it up in *any* style. In fact..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "We'll show him. You'll tear it up A..."
links.text: We'll show him. You'll tear it up ALL the styles!

links.title: You: ""Actually, Johnny Law isn't going t..."
links.text: "Actually, Johnny Law isn't going to tear it up, that would be unprofessional."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would, wouldn't it? It would be..."
links.text: "It would, wouldn't it? It would be *strange*. You see..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "No, it wouldn't. It would be themat..."
links.text: No, it wouldn't. It would be thematic.

links.title: You: ""No comment.""
links.text: "No comment."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Have I ever..." She turns to you...."
links.text: "Have I ever..." She turns to you. "Have you grown accustomed to your role as a 'police officer'?"

links.title: Authority: "OH YEAH, FEEL THE POWER."
links.text: OH YEAH, FEEL THE POWER.

links.title: You: ""I have grown accustomed to the *po..."
links.text: "I have grown accustomed to the *power*, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I can see that." She takes a sip...."
links.text: "I can see that." She takes a sip. "It suits you."

links.title: Suggestion: "There is the tiniest bit of flatter..."
links.text: There is the tiniest bit of flattery in there -- the way her eyes move from your shoulder to shoulder.

links.title: You: ""Once a cop -- always a cop.""
links.text: "Once a cop -- always a cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Like riding a 'copocycle.'" She ta..."
links.text: "Like riding a 'copocycle.'" She takes a sip of her coffee.

links.title: You: ""I have *very little* idea of what..."
links.text: "I have *very little* idea of what I'm doing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're doing just fine -- after al..."
links.text: "You're doing just fine -- after all, your path has led you back to me."

links.title: You: ""That is unimportant to the case at..."
links.text: "That is unimportant to the case at hand."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ah, I can see that you have, offic..."
links.text: "Ah, I can see that you have, officer." She nods.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Not met *per se*, but I've seen hi..."
links.text: "Not met *per se*, but I've seen him around, detective. Swooshing by. It has been quite a sight."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am sure it has. In the time we'v..."
links.text: "I am sure it has. In the time we've spent together, I must have covered 30 kilometres. He has a *track and field* approach to police work."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Isn't that odd? How *can* you run s..."
links.text: Isn't that odd? How *can* you run so much?

links.title: Endurance: "Why not? You're a powerhouse."
links.text: Why not? You're a powerhouse.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's about DEDICATION, son. That an..."
links.text: It's about DEDICATION, son. That and you're *probably* a gym teacher. Only a former gym teacher can think these thoughts and drink so much.

links.title: You: "Wait what? I'm a what?"
links.text: Wait what? I'm a what?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Doesn't matter! The flow of events..."
links.text: Doesn't matter! The flow of events is already passing you by! The woman said something, now the man's saying something... KEEP YOUR HEAD IN THE GAME, SON!

links.title: You: "Gym teacher?"
links.text: Gym teacher?

links.title: Endurance: "Actually, yeah... How? You have med..."
links.text: Actually, yeah... How? You have mediocre lungs.

links.title: You: "Then how am I able to do it..."
links.text: Then how am I able to do it...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Doesn't matter! The flow of events..."
links.text: Doesn't matter! The flow of events is passing you by! The woman said something, now the man's saying something... KEEP YOUR HEAD IN THE GAME, SON!

links.title: You: "Doesn't matter."
links.text: Doesn't matter.

links.title: Endurance: "Indeed. You don't strike yourself l..."
links.text: Indeed. You don't strike yourself like a powerhouse at all.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Across the city, the lieutenant sto..."
links.text: Across the city, the lieutenant stops to consider a smoke break. He shrugs off the urge: maybe tonight. His absence is palpable. Too late now.

links.title: You: ""Miss, I'm investigating, uh..." (G..."
links.text: "Miss, I'm investigating, uh..." (Gesture down to the yard.) "The people who put him there said to talk to you."

links.title: You: ""Miss, I'm investigating, uh..." (G..."
links.text: "Miss, I'm investigating, uh..." (Gesture down to the body in the yard.) "The people who put him there said to talk to you."
